comment: One of the best classes I've taken. He is very easy going and not a tough grader at all. Textbook and attendance not required. Easy A. If you see this class and professor available grab him quick!!!

Professor Sushil was a great professor to take for Human Resources class. There is not a ton of homework, and the work is very easy. A couple of group projects; also very easy. Enjoyed the course content a lot, and Professor Sushil was very caring for his students. You can tell he really cares for you and your future career! Definitely recommend.
